product_name: ICEBUG Anima BUGrip Road-Running Shoes - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The ICEBUG Anima BUGrip(TM) running shoes might look like conventional shoes, but with carbide studs in the soles they can handle terrain that others can't, such as slick streets and rugged trails. Carbibe-tip studs make it possible for you to keep your natural, relaxed stride even on slippery surfaces; tips provide traction on everything from dry asphalt to pure ice. Designed for road running, the Anima shoes are also suitable for use on trails. Water-repellent synthetic mesh and polyurethane uppers keep moisture out on wet days. Asymmetric molded lacing fixes the position of the heels and ankles over the soles while the forefeet can still move freely. Flexible construction of the soles allows for natural motion of your feet when you're running. Rubber toe bumpers and heel counters offer protection on the trail. Closeout.
short_description: The ICEBUG Anima BUGrip(TM) running shoes might look like conventional shoes, but with carbide studs in the soles they can handle terrain that others can't, such as slick streets and rugged trails.
